response.overview: Neal Kirby makes a subtle but noteworthy contribution to the Apple TV movie Blitz, released today. As an extra, he blends seamlessly into the film's authentic war atmosphere, adding depth to several key scenes.  In a particularly powerful sequence, Kirby appears amid a chaos of cascading water, evoking the palpable tension of surviving in the Blitz. His presence brings a grounded realism to the harrowing depiction of life under relentless artillery fire.
response.title: Blitz 2024 - Action, Drama, History, War
